Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I can't wait to make some chili with these! Take this alloy: it should do you more good than I. Enjoy.
I love spicy foods but getting what I need here is a pain. Using a ^orange;Gene Design Lab^white; could you perhaps ^green;make me some Ignus Chili seeds?^reset;. I'd reward you for the effort.
